description:
It doesn't get more classic than the Spirit, and this one is lighter than ever. The H-shape reduces weight so you can rack up light for long sport routes or multi pitches. Comes in a 6 coloured pack to match your cam and nut sizes.

  • 5% lighter than the previous version
  • Profile offers an impressive strength to weight ratio
  • Wide contact surfaces allow the rope to glide and reduce wear on the carabiner
  • Keylock nose for unhindered clipping
  • 6 different colours to organise your rack
name: Petzl Spirit Bent Gate Carabiner (6 Pack)
